items.sentence: I knew something bad would happen if Tom and Mary went hiking together.
I like both Tom and Mary, but I think Tom is more fun to hang out with.
I never learned to speak French very well until Tom started to help me.
Tom certainly doesn\'t have any clue about how things work around here.
I\'m not trying to stir up trouble. I\'m just telling you what I heard.
Every time Tom and Mary were about to kiss, someone came into the room.
Tom knew that there was something in the box, but he didn\'t know what.
Tom says he\'s tired of being the one who always has to make decisions.
It was during the rainy season three years ago that Tom first met Mary.
Would you please show me a camera that is less expensive than this one?
